roleset.name: attach, join again
roleset.note: REJOIN-V NOTES: Oddly, this is the sense predicted by verbnet, but it doesn't seem tooccur in the corpus. Yet? (from rejoin.01-v)

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: Mr. Harper, a veteran of several manufacturing companies who *trace* rejoined Campbell in 1986, will take charge of all overseas operations as well as Pepperidge.

example.name: rejoin in
example.text: Bowing to criticism, Bear Stearns, Morgan Stanley and Oppenheimer rejoined PaineWebber in suspending stock-index arbitrage trading for their own accounts.
example.arg: Bear Stearns, Morgan Stanley and Oppenheimer
in suspending stock-index arbitrage trading for their own accounts

example.name: rejoin as
example.text: In Barry Wright, Mr. Sim sees a situation ``very similar'' to the one he faced when he rejoined Applied as president and chief operating officer in 1985.
example.arg: as president and chief operating officer

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John rejoined the fragments of his coffee cup with duct tape.
example.arg: the fragments of his coffee cup
